Oh...My....God. Your still fighting??? About something that happened months=
 ago?? The past is gone, arguing now isn't going to change that. And I've (=
personally) stopped reading both of your posts, I don't care to see the arg=
uing. But with this it went to far, I mean come on, it was months ago!!!

D=

arMachine dives to the side, the shot hitting him in the arm (sorry,

e missiles at Shokaract.

king the giant bot rule. Ouch.

ooks up at WarMachine, the horns

ct had been charging some negative energy to use through the

  >=
 > of Conquest, and he decided now was the time to use it. It had the
  > p=
ower to
  > > make one large blast be the power of 10 Large blasts, but he =
could
  > only use
  > > one before having to recharge. Shokaract pulls the=
 energy into his
  > hands,
  > > making him glow and making rocks around h=
im melt as they were
  > caught in it.

moved very quickly towards WarMachine,
  > > Shokaract intending them to sp=
lit apart again...
